name: Graveyard Drift
description: Shift into gear and drift into zombies! In this action-packed arcade game, go for a high score by taking out as many zombies as you can before they tear your car to shreds! Keep an eye on your speedometer and shift gears when needed to avoid stalling out! Take a risk by drifting into zombies for double the damage, but avoid crashing or else you're done for!
